title: Message to the Kips Bay Boys' Club.
text:
I CORDIALLY congratulate the Kips Bay Boys' Club upon the formal opening of their new building and warmly hope that the boys may find much happiness in enjoyment of its greater opportunities for their benefit and pleasure.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Chester Aldrich, Kips Bay Boys' Club, 340 East 54th Street, New York City]
